        public Appointment getUpcomingAppointment​(int userId)
        Description copied from interface: AppointmentDao
        Gets the next upcoming appointment associated with the given userId.
        Specified by:
        getUpcomingAppointment in interface AppointmentDao
        Parameters:
        userId - The userId to get the next appointment for.
        Returns:
        Returns the Appointment requested, or null if there are no appointments in the next 15 minutes.

      • isOverlappingAppointment

        public boolean isOverlappingAppointment​(int customerId,
                                        Instant start,
                                        Instant end,
                                        int appointmentId)
        Description copied from interface: AppointmentDao
        Checks if the times would overlap with an existing appointment for this customer.
        Specified by:
        isOverlappingAppointment in interface AppointmentDao
        Parameters:
        customerId - The id of the customer to check.
        start - The start time of the prospective appointment.
        end - The end time of the prospective appointment.
        appointmentId - The id of the prospective appointment to check.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the appointment times overlaps. Else returns false.

      • parseResult

        private Appointment parseResult​(ResultSet result)
                         throws SQLException
        Parses the ResultSet into a new Appointment.
        Parameters:
        result - The ResultSet to parse.
        Returns:
        Returns Appointment created with the parsed data.
        Throws:
